This UI uses the ABIs shipped in the Hardhat artifacts folder. If a contract is not deployed yet, you can still inspect its function signatures.

Static frontend (no framework). Uses ethers.js (CDN). Designed to be served from the repo root so it can load artifact ABIs from /artifacts.
